fields.title: Titanic
fields.description: Titanic was the most expensive film ever made at the time, with a production budget of $200 million. Filming took place from July 1996 to March 1997.

fields.title: The Godfather
fields.description: A crime saga chronicling the powerful Italian-American Corleone family.

fields.title: The Dark Knight
fields.description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind causing chaos in Gotham.

fields.title: Inception
fields.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology.

fields.title: Pulp Fiction
fields.description: Intersecting stories of crime and redemption in Los Angeles.

fields.title: Schindler's List
fields.description: The true story of a man who saved Jews during the Holocaust.

fields.title: Forrest Gump
fields.description: A man with a kind heart witnesses decades of American history.

fields.title: The Matrix
fields.description: A hacker learns the shocking truth about his reality.

fields.title: Star Wars: A New Hope
fields.description: A young farmer joins a rebellion against a galactic empire.

fields.title: Avengers: Endgame
fields.description: The Avengers assemble for a final battle against Thanos.

fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption
fields.description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

fields.title: Jurassic Park
fields.description: Dinosaurs are brought back to life in a theme park with deadly consequences.

fields.title: The Lion King
fields.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom before learning his true destiny.

fields.title: Gladiator
fields.description: A Roman general seeks revenge against a corrupt emperor.

fields.title: Interstellar
fields.description: A team travels through a wormhole to find a new home for humanity.

fields.title: Parasite
fields.description: A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household.

fields.title: The Silence of the Lambs
fields.description: An FBI trainee seeks help from a cannibal to catch another killer.

fields.title: Joker
fields.description: An aspiring comedian descends into madness in Gotham City.

fields.title: The Avengers
fields.description: Earth's mightiest heroes team up to fight an alien invasion.

fields.title: Frozen
fields.description: Two sisters struggle to control magical powers and save their kingdom.

fields.title: Finding Nemo
fields.description: A clownfish searches for his missing son across the ocean.

fields.title: The Departed
fields.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police try to expose each other.

fields.title: Black Panther
fields.description: T'Challa returns home to lead Wakanda but faces internal and external threats.

fields.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
fields.description: The rise and fall of a stockbroker involved in corruption and fraud.

fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
fields.description: A group of intergalactic misfits must save the galaxy from destruction.

fields.title: Coco
fields.description: A boy travels to the Land of the Dead to uncover his family's secrets.

fields.title: Toy Story
fields.description: Toys come to life when humans aren't around, leading to wild adventures.

fields.title: Braveheart
fields.description: The story of William Wallace and Scotland's fight for freedom.

fields.title: Django Unchained
fields.description: A freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a cruel plantation owner.

fields.title: The Prestige
fields.description: Two magicians engage in a battle of wits and illusions.

fields.title: Up
fields.description: An elderly man and a boy go on an adventure in a flying house.

fields.title: Shrek
fields.description: An ogre embarks on a quest to rescue a princess with his donkey friend.

fields.title: The Incredibles
fields.description: A family of superheroes hides their powers while living a suburban life.

fields.title: The Social Network
fields.description: The founding of Facebook and the lawsuits that followed.

fields.title: Goodfellas
fields.description: The rise and fall of a mob associate over several decades.

fields.title: Casablanca
fields.description: A nightclub owner in Casablanca must choose between love and duty.

fields.title: La La Land
fields.description: A jazz musician and an aspiring actress fall in love in Los Angeles.

fields.title: Whiplash
fields.description: A young drummer faces abuse from his perfectionist instructor.

fields.title: The Pianist
fields.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the Holocaust.

fields.title: Spirited Away
fields.description: A girl navigates a magical world to save her parents.

fields.title: The Green Mile
fields.description: A prison guard encounters a gentle giant with mysterious powers.

fields.title: A Beautiful Mind
fields.description: The life of brilliant mathematician John Nash.

fields.title: Se7en
fields.description: Two detectives hunt a killer who uses the seven deadly sins.

fields.title: Alien
fields.description: The crew of a spaceship is hunted by a deadly alien creature.

fields.title: Back to the Future
fields.description: A teenager travels back in time and must ensure his parents meet.

fields.title: Blade Runner 2049
fields.description: A blade runner unearths a secret that could change society.

fields.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
fields.description: The adventures of a legendary hotel concierge and his protégé.
